ch0130_40_serena/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Did you get a good night’s sleep?
ch0130_40_serena/0101_0701_02_10:
If you’re going out on an adventure, I’m going
with you, OK?
ch0130_40_serena/7101_0701_01_10:
How’s my outfit today? It’s got a grown-up feel to
it, don’t you think?
ch0130_40_serena/7101_0701_02_10:
Check out this chic Whimsicott bag! Isn’t it the
perfect accent?
ch0130_40_serena/7102_0701_01_10: It’s great to use words to express how you feel.
ch0130_40_serena/7102_0701_02_10:
And if you add a small present to it, your feelings
might be better understood!
ch0130_40_serena/7102_0701_03_10:
Do you have someone you want to express your
feelings to?
ch0130_40_serena/7103_0701_01_10:
My Whimsicott has such a cute face, but she’s a
real rascal!
ch0130_40_serena/7103_0701_02_10:
She bounces around my room and gets cotton
everywhere! It’s a big mess to clean up!
ch0130_40_serena/7103_0701_03_10:
If she gets wet, she gets heavy and can’t move,
so she’s more careful when there’s a cup of
something on the table.
ch0130_40_serena/7103_0701_04_10:
That doesn’t mean she stops bouncing
around, though!
ch0130_40_serena/7104_0701_01_10: Isn’t this dress great? It’s the color of chocolate!
ch0130_40_serena/7104_0701_02_10: Bitter dark chocolate with a tart raspberry kick...
ch0130_40_serena/7105_0701_01_10: Don’t a lot of girls like romantic things?
ch0130_40_serena/7105_0701_02_10:
Honestly, I think what people find romantic is
different from person to person.
ch0130_40_serena/7105_0701_03_10: In my case, it would be...
ch0130_40_serena/7105_0701_04_10:
*giggle* What do you think? Why don’t you try
and guess what it is?
ch0130_40_serena/1701_0701_01_10: Here, I got this present for you!
ch0130_40_serena/1701_0702_01_10:
I really put my all into getting it for you, so I hope
you treat it well.
ch0130_40_serena/2501_0701_01_10:
I don’t think it’s true that feelings can be fully
expressed without saying them aloud.
ch0130_40_serena/2501_0701_02_10:
No matter how much trust you have, you have to
make sure you say what you’re feeling!
ch0130_40_serena/2501_0701_03_10:
So even if it’s a little embarrassing, make sure you
muster up the courage to say things, OK?
ch0130_40_serena/2501_0702_01_10:
I think it takes a lot of courage to be honest about
your true feelings.
ch0130_40_serena/2501_0702_02_10:
If it’s hard to say, you can get them a present, 
and slip in a small card along with it...
ch0130_40_serena/2511_0701_01_10:
I traveled around Kalos and met a lot of people
here on Pasio, too.
ch0130_40_serena/2511_0701_02_10:
I learned that there are a lot of different kinds
of love.
ch0130_40_serena/2511_0701_03_10:
Trusting your partner Pokémon, being grateful for
your friends, respecting your family... There are a
lot of ways to show your love!
ch0130_40_serena/2511_0702_01_10:
I want to keep on traveling to discover all the
different kinds of love we have in the world!
ch0130_40_serena/2511_0702_02_10:
Maybe there are some kinds of love that I don’t
know about yet!
ch0130_40_serena/3001_0701_01_10:
I dunno if my neighbors were baking this morning,
but I woke up to the smell of something sweet...
It was amazing.
ch0130_40_serena/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s easy to lose focus in a place like Pasio, but
the best Trainers are able to pull it together and
keep their eyes on the prize!
ch0130_40_serena/3005_0701_01_10:
Nice job out there today! You should treat yourself
to a warm, cozy cup of Tapu Cocoa before bed.
I highly recommend it!
